details:
smite

[smaIt; smait]

及物动词
(smote[smot; smout]; smit.ten[sm t; 'smitn])
1 (文语.谑)
a. 打,重击[with]
The blacksmith smote the anvil.
铁匠锤打铁砧
b. 打倒,打败,杀<敌人等>
2 a. <疾病、灾难等> …袭击
He is smitten with flu.
他患了流行性感冒
b. <良心等> 谴责…
She was smitten with remorse.
她深感懊悔
c. <美女、美的东西> 迷惑…
He was smitten with [by] the charming girl.
他被那个迷人的女孩子迷住了
They are smitten with each other.
他们彼此倾慕
